mapper.select: select emp_name, rank_title, job_title, emp_id,dept_title from employee e join rank r on e.rank_code=r.rank_code join job j on e.job_code=j.job_code join department d on e.dept_code=d.dept_code where resign_flag='N' order by emp_name

select emp_name, rank_title, job_title, emp_id,dept_title from employee e join rank r on e.rank_code=r.rank_code join job j on e.job_code=j.job_code join department d on e.dept_code=d.dept_code where resign_flag='N'
and e.dept_code='D0'
and e.dept_code='D1'
and e.dept_code='D2'
and e.dept_code='D3'
and e.dept_code='D4'
and e.dept_code='D5'

select * from employee e join rank r on e.rank_code=r.rank_code join job j on e.job_code=j.job_code join department d on e.dept_code=d.dept_code where emp_id=#{empId} and resign_flag='N'
